summary: This document is a letter from Norbert Ehrich, Senior Vice President/General Manager of Jet Aviation Palm Beach, addressed to Detective Joe Recarey of the Palm Beach Police Department. It encloses requested information and offers further assistance if needed. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of the letter from Jet Aviation, indicating his involvement in an investigation.

persons.name: Norbert Ehrich
persons.context: Norbert Ehrich is the sender of the letter, providing information requested by Detective Recarey.

connections.description: Detective Recarey is in communication with Norbert Ehrich regarding information related to an investigation.

keyFacts: Norbert Ehrich is the Senior Vice President/General Manager of Jet Aviation Palm Beach.
The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive information is involved.
The letter offers further assistance to Detective Recarey if needed.
The correspondence is part of an ongoing investigation by the Palm Beach Police Department.
